thread.title: Best hotel in New York for location - Review
thread.title_full: Best hotel in New York for location - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kim P
title: Best hotel in New York for location - Review
text: This was my second stay here. My room 2504 had a fantastic view of the Empire State Building. I prefer staying in Herald Square. Not as crowded as Times Square.The subway entrance is literally out the front door. The bed was great and I didn't want to leave! Will definitely stay here again.
